attributes.additional_details:
Many outdoor leisure areas are under threat as hard-up councils sell them off for housing or large supermarket developments or even link roads to supermarkets.

That,s why it's vital that we preerve parks and playing fields ect, to ensure future generations of football - crickets, ruby players

All often playingfields are victims of  commerial and residential developments and we need to stop this, to make sure everyone can live healthly and active lives.

Trees are also felled

We need a law requiring local parks and recreation Grounds to be much more protected
